Title: Dragon Ball Z: Dead Zone
Genre: Animation, Short, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga), Takao Koyama (screenplay), Eric Vale (English script)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Toshio Furukawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Mayumi Tanaka
Plot: In order to wish for immortality and avenge his father, Garlic Jr. collects the dragon balls, kidnapping Goku's son Gohan in the process. Goku, Kami, Piccolo, and Krillin unite to rescue Gohan and save the world from being sucked into a dead zone.
